name: Project X (itch) (srk86)
description:
To Install Just extract and Run ProtocolX.exe

In this Game you play as the sole robot capable of saving you Space Station from destruction!  But you are an old bot and you're slowly running out of hard drive space, and visual space.  Battle the rogue AI and his minions!  

All Asset animations and Code were created by the team of 4 that worked on this Project

!!!FLASH WARNING!!!  This game makes use of many visual effects and flashing colors,  play with caution!  Especially Towards the end

Controls

WASD - Movement

Left Mouse Button (click)- Light Attack

Left Mouse Button (hold)-Heavy Attack

Right Mouse Button To Block
